item.title: Hey Copilot!
item.description:
Hey Copilot!

So, you’ve got an idea of a new app or a web site, that you wish to build with GitHub Copilot.

item.title: Teaching GitHub Copilot New SQL Dialects with Reusable Prompts
item.description: Have you ever struggled with GenAI tools generating incorrect or unusable code for your internal SDK or API?
